sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'; import { useState, useEffect } from 'react' import '../App.css' import data from "../data.json" import Image from '../assets/mercury.png' function Mercury() { let mercury = data[0] let [active, setActive] = useState({ background: `#419EBB`, border: 'none' }) let [overview, setOverview] = useState(mercury.overview.content) let [structure, setStructure] = useState(mercury.structure.content) let switchBtn = () => { console.log('hi') } return (

{mercury.name}

{overview}

Source: Wikipedia

ROTATION TIME

{mercury.rotation}

REVOLUTION TIME

{mercury.revolution}

RADIUS

{mercury.radius}

AVERAGE TEMP.

{mercury.temperature}

); } export default Mercury;
